attributes.action: Insist that hitting a family's pet cat in your car is a reportable offence.  Dogs are so why on Earth shouldn't cats be?!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our cat was recently mown down by a speeding motorist inches from our garden fence.  The driver did not stop, or even brake!  The cat was horribly injured and very near to death.  Why should the motorist be able to get away with this when, had it been a pet dog, they would have been prosecuted for driving off in this heartless manner?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
